cab.content: ((P 7781) From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 477926$ October 1920.(Received 27th, 9.30 a.m.)Clear the line.1246 S. My telegram of 15th October last, 1201 S. Afghanistan. Two officials detained at Afghanistan were handed back at Chaman 26th October.Para. 2 of proposed conditions regarding British delegation to Kabul should, therefore, be cancelled.
